title: Operation of Core Category Duty Free Concessions at the Terminal 01 of the Bandaranaike International Airport (BIA), Katunayake
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Nimal Siripala de Silva, the Minister of Transport and Civil Aviation, to award the contract of Core Category Duty Free Concession Space 2 in the arrival and departure restricted areas of Terminal 01 of the Bandaranaike International Airport (BIA), Katunayake, for a period of the proceeding 05 years to M/s. Dufry AG of Switzerland, as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
